point1: Learn the basics of stock market investing, including stock selection and portfolio diversification.
Gain insights into real estate investing, including buying rental properties and house hacking.
Understand the principles of achieving financial independence and retiring early.
Learn negotiation techniques for better deals on purchases, contracts, and salary negotiations.
Discover how to make tax-efficient charitable contributions and engage in philanthropic activities.
Understand the psychology of spending and how to make conscious and mindful financial choices.
Learn how to become a financial coach or advisor to help others manage their money.
Study the psychological factors that influence financial decisions and behaviors.

course: Financial Security in Durations of Crisis
point1: Develop strategies for maintaining financial stability during economic downturns and crises.
Gain insights into economic indicators and how they impact personal finances.
Understanding the various life insurance policies, their features, and the importance of life insurance in financial planning.
Exploring health insurance coverage, policies, and the role of health insurance in healthcare management.
Learning about auto insurance, liability coverage, and vehicle insurance requirements.
Awareness of consumer rights and financial responsibilities.
